website_summaries.verdict: With a beautiful brushed stainless steel finish, and gorgeous design, this watering can is as pleasant to look at as it is to use.
pros: The ultra-thin no-spill spout makes it easy to water your plants without those annoying accidental spills on your plant’s leaves, or on other items in your home
The perfect can for regular indoor use
cons: Some find the 1500 ml capacity too small for watering multiple plants in the home during one session

customer_reviews.title: Love this watering pot
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought me this watering can as a gift. I was taken aback at the price when I saw it here but I absolutely love it both for its functionality and looks. The handle is comfortable, the spout is long and reaches into tight spaces. It's a little bit of luxury.
customer_reviews.author: bnb

customer_reviews.title: Pretty enough to leave out
customer_reviews.text: Comfy handle, holds just enough to make the houseplant rounds, Pretty enough to leave out. The spout cover seems like a small thing, but prevents spills when walking from the sink to the plant. The angle keeps water from spashing out too. Small and big ideas in one.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Anne

customer_reviews.title: Very practical and stylish ... not sure how durable
customer_reviews.text: 08/03/20 UPDATE - a small amount of rust inside the can remains but so far has not affected its function. Using it daily for watering my houseplants and it’s holding up. Just the perfect size to water indoor plants. Not heavy with full capacity. The spout welding is situated lower in the reservoir and is quite narrow - perfect to deliver water with a gentle flow directly at root level. Very stylish looking. Only concern is the visible rusting on the inside with a couple of months use. I do empty out after each use, still there’s rust forming ... hope it’ll not affect the durability in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah_T

customer_reviews.title: lightweight...just right!
customer_reviews.text: Love the slim, lightweight look...sits in my office, almost, as part of the decor...definitely has personality as well as usefully fulfilling its intended purpose...a vessel, holding just enough water to make a weekly round keeping my green friends happy! :)
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Martin

customer_reviews.title: Small, but nice design....
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be of nice quality and has an appealing design (to me -- chrome, modern); BUT I feel it is a bit expensive for what it is. I paid $24.99. I don't know if it is "worth" quite that much, however - I will keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Therese

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love this watering can. Holds lots of water and what I like best is the spout is long and easy to tuck in amongst tiny leaves and no water splashes out. Looks pretty at the side of my garden window.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: After searching and doing my research on watering cans, I finally found this product which is of great quality and beautiful design. It’s almost a year later and I’m still loving my watering can. Could not be happier with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: M.V.

customer_reviews.title: I love this watering can!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this watering can. I can now leave it out on my plant table which will benefit the plants because they will now get watered on a more regular basis. Win-win!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically pleasing and great design!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Small but perfect for watering my indoor herbs. I keep it next to the plants because it’s so aesthetically pleasing! I wish I could get it in a bigger size!
customer_reviews.author: comp5330

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertizedExactly 51 oz
customer_reviews.text: Very nice high end quality wanted larger they have but this 51oz.has style. Came fast
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customerjoanne

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: A bit heavy for the size, doesn’t hold a lot of water, not the easiest / most comfortable to hold or pour. Wasn’t bad enough to return and I still use it
customer_reviews.author: G. Chen

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I like this watering can. The only reason I'm not giving it 5 stars is because of some obvious imperfections in the metal work
customer_reviews.author: John Mocks

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel water can
customer_reviews.text: The design is ok. The stainless steal is nice looking. But the size is too small if you have large plants.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Well made and very solid, great for smaller house plants as the small spout does not pour very quickly. Looks fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: BryceJoseph

customer_reviews.title: Built to last and beautiful to look at.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little watering can and will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: R. Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful small watering can
customer_reviews.text: Clean look, works well, but just note the size is small so best for a small set of plants.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Time
customer_reviews.text: I find it very difficult to rate a product two days after I receive it.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ann Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and practical
customer_reviews.text: Nice modern look. Just the right capacity for my needs - not too big, not too small.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S. Posmentier

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and functional
customer_reviews.text: Watering can is attractive and sturdy. Lower flow spout is excellent for indoor plants. It's light weight enough for over head and doesn't drip like others. So far, repells water spots and rust.
customer_reviews.author: Julie G

customer_reviews.title: Meets needs for self-watering planters
customer_reviews.text: It did take a long time to arrive and it is made in China, certainly a conflicted time, worldwide for orders like this.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie East

customer_reviews.title: Its exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: I totally like it and it is great to just have out on display so I do not have to look for space.
customer_reviews.author: stay safe

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality & leaky
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with two holes in the side which leak water.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: This watering can looks great, but it leaked immediately at the connection to the spout and the handle. It doesn't hold water.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Messmer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watering can
customer_reviews.text: This looks beautiful. I can leave it out between waterings, and it looks like decoration. Easy to use, pointed tip, so no mess while watering
customer_reviews.author: Ritu S.

customer_reviews.title: Can leaks quite a bit from the handle.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the design, the small spout is perfect for my smaller plants. Sadly, it leaks quite a bit from where the bottom of the handle attaches to the can. Going back over the reviews, this is a common problem. I can’t believe this can is still being sold when so many people have reported this problem. From now on, I won’t look at other peoples reviews as just a fluke. Don’t buy this watering can.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hill

customer_reviews.title: I like it with one exception
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size of this watering can and the finish has stayed nice even with keeping on the screened porch all summer. It is a perfect size and not too heavy when full and the spout can get into inside areas of the plant. The only thing I find that is a bit annoying is that when you tilt it up some water stays in the can behind the lip at the top. So you have to keep tilting it up and down to get it all out. Small thing, but still annoying if you are in a hurry.
customer_reviews.author: N. Roth

customer_reviews.title: It leaks—worthless
customer_reviews.text: HAHAHAHAHA I filled it with water for literally the first time and it started leaking from where the spout attaches to the container. Not a gush, but more than a slight drip, more than a finger over the leak can stop it. What a total waste.
customer_reviews.author: M

product_meta.title: Fdit Stainless Steel Watering Can Pot Indoor House Plants Long Spout Watering Can Modern Style Watering Pot 51 oz/1.5 L

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars84 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
